description: The New Fishman Pirates are a group of fishman-based pirates residing in Fishman Island, though they also include several mermen, sea monsters, and enslaved humans. The New Fishman Pirates are currently the most prominent figures in the long history of human/fishmen hate over their hero Fisher Tiger`s death.They carry on the legacy of Arlong, having established their crew based on Arlong`s ideals. Like Arlong, they wish to make fishmen the supreme race and aim to sink the humans into the ocean.
name: Shin Gyojin Kaizokudan
